edu.utah.seis.utility

Class UW2MS

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.utah.seis.utility.UW2MS

  • public class UW2MS
extends java.lang.Object
    This file converts SAC or UW data to a miniSEED file. The file is names with the name of the original file followed by the NSCL with "_" where spaces might be .ms e.g. if the input file was named joe.uw the output file might be joe.uw_UUJOE__SHZ__.ms.

    The data in a UW file is translated from the UW station header to the full SEED channel name using the uusschannel table in the MySQL data base. This file contains pairs of stations like " ymre -> WYYMR HHE ". These are maintained in the EdgeConfig GUI under the GSN or UUSS tab using the 'UUSS Chan' subtab. 

     Switch     Description
 -sac       The input file is SAC format, convert it to MiniSeed
 -uw        The input File is UW format, convert it to MiniSeeed using the MySQL UUSS translation table
                UW format files normally end in "D" and this program process it and the correspond 'd' file.
 -aqms      Change the output file name for UW files to follow the AQMS convention (NN.SSS.CCC.LL)
 -nooutput  Do not write out the files
 -dbg       More output
 
 Not used anymore:
 -init           Read in a uuss_translation.txt and make an initial uuss translation table
 -guess          Use uuss_translation.txt and try to guess the right codes
